abstract: Sergei A. Storchak is charged with conspiring to embezzle $43.4 million, in a politically tinged case seen as undermining the position of liberals in the Russian government.
snippet: Sergei A. Storchak is charged with conspiring to embezzle $43.4 million, in a politically tinged case seen as undermining the position of liberals in the Russian government.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Nov. 23 — Russian prosecutors charged a deputy finance minister who was the country’s chief sovereign debt negotiator on Friday with conspiring to embezzle $43.4 million in a politically tinged case seen as undermining the position of liberals in the Russian government.

headline.main: Deputy Finance Minister Is Charged in Russia
headline.print_headline: Deputy Finance Minister Is Charged in Russia
